thread.title: Cindy Crawford says putting her husband is key to marriage | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Cindy Crawford says putting her husband is key to marriage | Daily Mail Online

author: Josh Hanrahan For Daily Mail Australia
title: Cindy Crawford says putting her husband is key to marriage | Daily Mail Online
text: 111 shares 'I make my husband a priority and don't take things for granted. 'If I'm away for three days, then I make sure I'm around the next week. I'm very realistic about how much time stuff takes and I find the balance.' Happy family: The supermodel said living in Malibu not New York or LA had been crucial to the upbringing of her children Presley (far left) and Kaia (left) and marriage to Rande (far right) A household name since becoming an original supermodel, it's proved impossible for Cindy's son Presley, 17, and daughter Kaia, 15, to stay out of the limelight. Especially with Kaia - who bears many of the genetic traits that made her mother famous - already entering the industry as one of the leading up-and-coming models. And with a throwback photo from when she was one of the biggest models on the planet, her husband Rande celebrated her birthday this week. Taken 25 years ago, the image showed Cindy sitting on her husbands lap and smiling as she looks down excitedly on a cake decorated with white icing and strawberries. Priorities: 'I make my husband a priority and don't take things for granted,' Cindy revealed Throwback! Cindy's daughter Kaia posted this birthday tribute to her doting mother online as she turned 51 this week 'Some things never change, just the number. Happy Birthday to my girl,' Rande, who married Cindy in 1998, captioned the photo. Her daughter Kaia also sent her mother love for her special day, posting a photo of the pair from a trip to Disneyland. Longtime friend and clothing designer Gail Elliott and supermodel Christy Turlington Burns were among other high profile stars to wish her a happy birthday. Beauties! Longtime friend and clothing designer Gail Elliott shared this photo of herself and the model in the 90s Read more: Share or comment on this article 111
